#room_cave_entrance.description: You can feel the sunlight touching your face

#room_passage_level_1.description:
You are in a passage that is located right after the cave entrance.
It gets darker as you go deeper into the cave

#room_abandoned_campsite.description:
It seems that you are not the first one to discover this cave.
Previous owners left here some of their stuff

#room_passage_level_2.description:
The passage is really dark, you can barely see.
You can't go deeper without a proper source of LIGHT

#room_darkroom.description: Your lit lantern provides enough light to navigate the cave passage.

#room_ancient_temple.description:
From carvings in the wall you guess, you have entered an ancient temple.
There is an empty stand, on which the artifact rested for ages.

auto_commands.command_show_message:
Suddenly you spot an evil demon holding the 'Staff of Awakening'.
It is ready to drain your life.

#creature_zombie_adventurer.description: A body of a dead adventurer controlled by evil magic.

#creature_temple_demon.description:
A demon holding the 'Staff of Awakening'.
He is ready to drain life from you.

#item_research_documents.description: Documents containing research of the historical artifact 'The Staff of Awakening'

read.command_show_message:
You have collected clues about the artifact, known as 'Staff of Awakening' from all around the world.
They all lead here, to this cave located far from civilisation.
Rumors say that the staff gives the user a magical ability to control the power of life.
It can drain life of the living and turn the dead into evil soldiers.
You can't let it get into the wrong hands.
Collect the artifact and save the world ... alone

#item_whip.description: It is made of braided leather.

#item_tent.description: The tent is covered in a layer of dust. It seems it hasn't been used in a long time.

take.command_show_message: The tent doesn't fit into your bag. You don't need it anyway

examine.command_show_message:
You take a closer look at the inside of the tent.
There is nobody in there, but you can see a small wooden box in the corner of the tent.

#item_tent_examined.description: The tent is covered in a layer of dust. It seems it hasn't been used in a long time.

#item_wooden_box_full.description: A small wooden box. The box is closed and there may be some things inside.

take.command_show_message: The box doesn't fit into your bag. You don't need it anyway

open.command_show_message: You open the box, revealing the content. You have found a lighter.

#item_wooden_box_empty.description: A small wooden box. The box is opened and there is nothing inside.

take.command_show_message: The box doesn't fit into your bag. You don't need it anyway

#item_lighter.description: A portable device used to create a flame

#item_dead_body.description: A body of a dead man lies on a cave floor. Probably an adventurer.

take.command_show_message:
You move closer to the dead body but suddenly it starts to move and make strange noises.
It turns its head to your direction, revealing a face with a pair of lifeless eyes.
It tries to hit, but you step aside, and avoid the attack.
KILL IT!

examine.command_show_message:
You move closer to the dead body but suddenly it starts to move and make strange noises.
It turns its head to your direction, revealing a face with a pair of lifeless eyes
It tries to hit you, but you step aside, and avoid the attack.
You need a source of fire to LIGHT the lantern

light.command_show_message: The lantern is now lit and provides light.

#item_lantern_lit.description: The lantern is lit and provides light for you to see.

read.command_good_end:
If you are reading this, it means you have solved my puzzles
and collected the artifact.
Thank you for your time, it means a lot to me

#item_bottle_of_water.description: A bottle full of refreshing water

#equipment_artifact_staff_of_awakening.description: The guardian of the temple holds this artifact in its hands.

whip.command_show_message:
You strike your whip and the whip wraps around the artifact.
The artifact is pulled straight to you.

#trans_darkness.description: All you can see is darkness. You can't go any deeper without a proper source of LIGHT
